Freezing of the Heart

  • Card Variation:

    Trap

  • Play Style:

    Trap activates on 1, 2, 4, 17. Once triggered, you can place, from your hand out of turn, a soul with an organic keal means in the same territory as this card.

  • History:

    Svetlana is the heiress to a great and ancient fortune from a family who possesses great pride. As such, she was highly encouraged to pursue rigorous formal education in the sciences in order to offer great impact on the world and further her families name. She spent more than twice the average amount of time dedicated to her studies and emerged a prominent biophysicist whose work promoted the capabilities of cryogenics. Still, she often dreams of the life she desired when she was little. The life of free expression, the life of an artist. Svetlana, in her little free time, carves ice sculptures representative of her most recent research as catharsis to her present and past.

  • Scarcity:
    Founder's Deck
